text: what are your thoughts on sustainability and this kind of sustainability movement in agriculture how would you kind of frame that up well that's a great question because I'm also uh on the Texas peanut producers board and I'm on a couple of committees that do sustainability now so it's so creative where A's been you know we used to do all chemical fertilizers and even on my operation now we do a lot of manure or compost my son actually does a lot of compost where we don't do any kind of natural fertilizer so we've spread 3 to four tons on our peanuts which that's a sustainability issue is chemical fertilizers you know and we use them on our Organics down here also you know our compost
